body_html:
@skye, I will test it but there will be still some error. What bothers me is that I would expect same error regardless the batch size.

I have tested more and I am seeing the first errors in slim.conv2d(branch_2, 32, [3, 3], scope='Conv2d_0b_3x3'). In most executions the initial error is there but sometimes there is no error there. I am testing always with the same mode loading the same checkpoint and with the same input.
body_text:
@skye, I will test it but there will be still some error. What bothers me is that I would expect same error regardless the batch size.
I have tested more and I am seeing the first errors in slim.conv2d(branch_2, 32, [3, 3], scope='Conv2d_0b_3x3'). In most executions the initial error is there but sometimes there is no error there. I am testing always with the same mode loading the same checkpoint and with the same input.
body:
@skye, I will test it but there will be still some error. What bothers me is that I would expect same error regardless the batch size.

I have tested more and I am seeing the first errors in `slim.conv2d(branch_2, 32, [3, 3], scope='Conv2d_0b_3x3')`. In most executions the initial error is there but sometimes there is no error there. I am testing always with the same mode loading the same checkpoint and with the same input.
